question:
Universal Containers (UC) has a queue that is used for managing tasks that need to be worked by the UC customer support team. The same team will now be working some of UC's Cases.

Which two options should the administrator use to help the support team?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Configure a flow to assign the cases to the queue.
options.B: Add Cases to the existing queue as available object.
options.C: Use assignment rules to set the queue as the owner of the case.
options.D: Create a new queue and add Cases as an available object.

question:
Cloud Kicks wants to update the screen flow so that if the High Value Customer flag is set to true, the first screen is skipped and the user is directed to the second screen.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     

How should  administrator configure the decision element?

options.A: Use the contains operator and (!$GlobalConstant.False) as the value.
options.B: Use the equals operator and {!$GlobalConstant.True} as the value.
options.C: Use the equals operator and the High Value Customer value.
options.D: Use the contains operator and the value "High Value Customer".

question:
The sales team at Ursa Major Solar has asked the administrator to automate an outbound message.

What should the administrator utilize to satisfy the request?

options.A: Process Builder
options.B: Task Assignment
options.C: Recorded-triggered flow
options.D: Case Auto-Response Rule

question:
Ursa Solar Major is evaluating Salesforce for its service team and would like to know what objects were available out of the box.

Which three of the standard objects are available to an administrator considering a support use case?

Choose 3 answers

options.A: Account
options.B: Ticket
options.C: Request
options.D: Contract

question:
DreamHouse Realty has an approval process. A manager attempts to approve the record but receives an error.

What should the administrator review to troubleshoot this request?

options.A: Review the page layout to ensure the fields updated in the process are visible.
options.B: Add a delegated approver for the next approver in the process.
options.C: Update the field-level security to view on fields that are updated in the process.
options.D: Check if the user in the next approver is inactive or missing.

question:
The administrator at Cloud Kicks has been told that users are unable to add repeating tasks in Salesforce.

Which two solutions should the administrator use to ensure users are able to do this?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Enable Creation of Recurring Tasks in Activity Settings
options.B: Disable Shared Activities
options.C: Add Create Recurring Series of Tasks field on page layouts
options.D: Turn on Task Notifications Service

question:
A sales rep has a list of 300 accounts with contacts that they want to upload at one time.

Which tool should the administrator utilize to import the records to Salesforce?

options.A: Dataloader.io
options.B: Data Loader
options.C: Data Import Wizard
options.D: Manual Import

question:
The administrator at AW Computing wants Account details, related lists, and Chatter feeds to each appear on separate tabs when viewing an Account.

Which type of page should the administrator create?

options.A: Lightning record page
options.B: Lightning page tab
options.C: Lightning page component
options.D: Lightning app page

question: Which tool should an administrator use to identify and fix potential session vulnerabilities?

options.A: Field History Tracking
options.B: Organization-Wide Defaults
options.C: Security Health Check
options.D: Setup Audit Trail

question:
Sales and Customer Care at Ursa Major Solar need to see different fields on the Case related list from the Account record. Sales users want to see Case created date and status while Customer Care would like to see owner, status, and contact.

What should the administrator use to achieve this?

options.A: Compact Layout Editor
options.B: Search Layout Editor
options.C: Related Lookup Filters
options.D: Page Layout Editor

question:
The administrator at Ursa Major Solar has created a custom report type and bullt a report for the sales operations team. However, none of the users are able to access the report.

Which two options could cause this issue?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: The custom report type is in development.
options.B: The report is saved in a private folder.
options.C: The org has reached its limit for custom report types.
options.D: The user's profile is missing View access.

question:
Northern Trail Outfitters wants to calculate how much revenue has been generated for each of its marketing campaigns.

How should an administrator deliver this information?

options.A: Add a Total Value field on Campaign and use a workflow rule to update the value when an opportunity is won.
options.B: Create a roll-up summary field on Opportunity to Campaign.
options.C: Design a standard Campaign report and add the Value Won Opportunities in Campaign field.
options.D: Perform periodic data jobs to update campaign records.

question:
The call center manager at Ursa Major Solar wants to provide agents with a case dashboard that can be drilled down by case origin, status, and owner.

What should an administrator add to the dashboard to fulfill the request?

options.A: Combination Chart
options.B: Dashboard Filter
options.C: Bucket Column
options.D: Dashboard Component

question:
Cloud Kicks needs to change the owner of a case when it has been open for more than 7 days.

How should the administrator complete this requirement?

options.A: Assignment Rules
options.B: Validation Rules
options.C: Escalation Rules
options.D: Auto-Response Rules

question:
The Support team at Ursa Major Solar prefers using split list views on the case homepage. Occasionally, the team views shipments from another support application.

What should the administrator configure to allow the team to use the split list view?

options.A: Filter by a single shipment record type in the list view.
options.B: Split views are only available on standard objects.
options.C: Include the Shipments tab on the app's navigation bar.
options.D: Add the Manage List Views permission for support users.

question:
Ursa Major Solar has a path on Case. The company wants to require its users to follow the status values as they are on the path. Agents should be prohibited from reverting the Case back to a previous status.

Which feature should an administrator use to fulfill this request?

options.A: Predefined Field Values
options.B: Global Value Picklists
options.C: Dependent Picklists
options.D: Validation Rules

question:
Northern Trail Outfitters has the Case object set to private. The support manager raised a concern that reps have a broader view of data than expected and can see all cases on their group's dashboards.

What could be causing reps to have inappropriate access to data on dashboards?

options.A: Public Dashboards
options.B: Dashboard's running user
options.C: Dashboard Subscriptions
options.D: Dashboard Filters

question:
An analytics user at Cloud Kicks needs Read, Create, and Edit access for objects and should be restricted from deleting any records.

What should the administrator do to meet this requirement?

options.A: Create and assign a custom profile with Delete access removed for each object.
options.B: Assign the standard System Administrator profile to the analytics user.
options.C: Create and assign a permission set that includes Read, Create, and Edit access.
options.D: Give the user View All access and assign them to the highest role in the role hierarchy.

question:
Ursa Major Solar has service level agreements (SLA) that are routed to support queues. Cases that meet the 24 hour SLA need to be automatically re-assigned to the next tier queue.

Which feature should be used to fulfill this requirement?

options.A: Einstein Case Routing
options.B: Case assignment rule
options.C: Auto-response rule
options.D: Case escalation rule

question:
Universal Containers has a private sharing model for Opportunities and uses Opportunity teams. Criteria-based sharing rules are not used. A sales rep at Universal Containers leaves the company and their user record is deactivated. The rep is later rehired in the same role. The administrator activates the old user record. The user is added to the same default Opportunity teams but is no longer able to see the same records the user worked on before leaving the company.

What is the likely cause?

options.A: The record type of the Opportunity records was changed.
options.B: Permission sets were removed when the user was deactivated.
options.C: The records were manually shared with the user.
options.D: The stage of the Opportunity records was changed to closed lost.

question:
What are two considerations an administrator should keep in mind when working with Salesforce objects?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Custom and standard objects have standard fields.
options.B: A new standard object can be created.
options.C: Only standard objects support master-detail relationships.
options.D: Standard objects are included with Salesforce.

question:
An administrator has been asked to change the data type of an auto number to a text field.

What should the administrator be aware of before changing the field?

options.A: Existing field values will remain unchanged.
options.B: Existing field values will be converted.
options.C: Existing Auto Number field to Text is prevented.
options.D: Existing field values will be deleted.

question:
An administrator at Universal Containers needs a simple way to trigger an alert to the director of sales when opportunities reach an amount of $500,000.

options.A: Enable Opportunity Update Reminders.
options.B: Opportunity warnings in Kanban View
options.C: Set up Big Deal Alerts for the amount.

question:
An administrator has reviewed an upcoming critical update.

How should the administrator proceed with activation of the critical update?

options.A: Activate the critical update in a sandbox.
options.B: Allow the critical update to auto-activate in a sandbox.
options.C: Activate the critical update in production.
options.D: Allow the critical update to auto-activate.

question:
Cloud Kicks has a customer success agent going on leave and needs to change ownership on multiple cases.

Which two users are able to fulfill this request?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: A user with the System Administrator profile.
options.B: A user with a manager role above the agent.
options.C: A user with the Manage Cases permission.
options.D: A user with Read permission on the account.

question:
An administrator creates a custom text area field on the Account object and adds it to the service team's page layout. The service team manager loves the addition of this field and wants it to appear in the highlights panel so that the service reps can quickly find it when on the Account page.

How should the administrator accomplish this?

options.A: Make the field required and move it to the top of the page.
options.B: In the Account object manager, create a custom compact layout.
options.C: Create a new page layout and a new section titled highlights panel.
options.D: From the page layout editor, drag the field to the highlights panel.

question:
Cloud Kicks (CK) has a new administrator who is asked to put together a memo detailing Salesforce usage to budget for upcoming license purchases.

Where should the administrator go to find out what type of licenses CK has purchased and how many are available?

options.A: User licenses related list in company information
options.B: Search for licenses types in setup
options.C: User management settings in setup
options.D: Usage-based entitlements related list in company information

DreamHouse Realty wants to offer a form on its Experience Cloud site where inspectors will submit findings from a property inspection.

options.A: Autolaunched Flow
options.B: Related List
options.C: Record Detail
options.D: Screen Flow

question:
The marketing team at Ursa Major Solar wants to send a personalized email whenever a lead fills out the web-to-lead form on their website. They want to send different messages based on the Lead Industry field value.

What should an administrator configure to meet this requirement?

options.A: Use a validation rule to trigger workflow to email the lead.
options.B: Add a public group and Process Builder to email the lead.
options.C: Create an assignment rule to email the lead.
options.D: Configure an auto-response rule to email the lead.

question:
The administrator for AW Computing is working with a user who is having trouble logging in to Salesforce.

What should the administrator do to identify why the user is unable to log in?

options.A: Check the attempted logins by running the setup audit trail.
options.B: Pull the password history to ensure the password policy was followed.
options.C: Reset the security token for the profile.
options.D: Review the login history for the user.

question: Which setting on a profile makes a tab hidden in the All App Launcher or visible in any app, but still allows a user to view records that wouid normally be found under this tab?

options.A: Object Permissions
options.B: App Permissions

options.D: Org-wide Defaults

question:

options.A: Custom picklist
options.B: Multi-select picklist

question:
An administrator at Cloud Kicks wants to deactivate a user who has left the company.

What are two reasons that would prevent a user from being deactivated?

options.A: The user is the sole recipient of a workflow email alert.
options.B: The user is the highest role in the role hierarchy.
options.C: The user is in a custom hierarchy field.
options.D: The user is part of a territory hierarchy.

question:
Northern Trail Outfitters wants to know the average stage duration for all closed opportunities.

How should an administrator support this request?

options.A: Run the Opportunity Stage Duration report.
options.B: Add formula fields to track Stages on each Opportunity.
options.C: Refresh weekly reporting shapshots for Closed Opportunities.

question:
DreamHouse Realty (DHR) wants a templated process with a mortgage calculator that generates leads for loans, DHR needs to complete the project within 30 days and has maxed out its budget for the year.

question:

options.A: Error condition formula
options.B: Rule active date
options.C: Error message location

question:
Northern Trail Outfitters wants to track ROI for contacts that are key stakeholders for opportunities. The VP of sales requested that this information be accessible on the opportunity and available for reporting.

options.A: Customize Campaign Role.
options.B: Customize Campaign Member Role.
options.C: Customize Opportunity Contact Role.
options.D: Add the Opportunity Contact Role related list to the Opportunity page layout.

question:
Ursa Major Solar uses Opportunity to track sales of solar energy products. The company has two separate sales teams that focus on different energy markets. The services team also wants to use Opportunity to track installation. All three teams will need to use different fields and stages.

How should the administrator configure this requirement?

options.A: Create one sales process. Create three record types and three page layouts.
options.B: Create one sales process. Create one record type and three page layouts.
options.C: Create three sales processes. Create three record types and one page layout.
options.D: Create three sales processes. Create three record types and three page layouts.

question:
Northern Trail Outfitters wants to initiate expense reports from Salesforce to the external HR system, This process needs to be reviewed by managers and directors.

Which two tools should an administrator configure?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Email Alert Action
options.B: Approval Process
options.C: Quick Action
options.D: Outbound Message

question:
Ursa Major Solar offers amazing experiences for all of its employees. The employee engagement committee wants to post updates while restricting other employees from posting.

What should the administrator create to meet this request?

options.A: Chatter Recommendations
options.B: Chatter Broadcast Group
options.C: Chatter Stream
options.D: Chatter Unlisted Group

question:
The administrator at Cloud Kicks writes an assignment rule to send all cases created via email or the web to the Automated Cases Queue. Any manually created cases should be owned by the agent creating them; however, the manually created cases now show the administrator as the owner.

What will the administrator find when troubleshooting this issue?

options.A: An escalation rule is changing the case owner on case creation.
options.B: The Owner field is missing on the webform and email template.
options.C: The Assignment Rule checkbox is selected by default.
options.D: Another assignment rule is giving ownership to the administrator.

question:

Which automation tool supports creating a wizard to accomplish this goal?

options.A: Process Builder
options.B: Flow Builder
options.C: Approval Process
options.D: Outbound Message

question:
Sales reps miss key fields when filling out an opportunity record through the sales process. Reps need to move forward in stages but are unable to enter a previous stage.

Which three options should the administrator use to address this need?

Choose 3 answers

options.A: Mark fields required on the page layout.
options.B: Enable guided selling.
options.C: Configure Opportunity Path.
options.D: Use validation rules.
options.E: Use Flow to mark fields required.

question:
The Sales manager at DreamHouse Realty wants the sales users to have a quick way to view and edit the Opportunities in their pipeline expected to close in the next 90 days.

What should an administrator do to accomplish this request?

options.A: Enable Sales Console and show users how to open a tab for each opportunity in the pipeline that meets the requirements.
options.B: Create a custom report and schedule the sales users to receive it each day as a reminder to update their opportunities.
options.C: Make a new Sales dashboard and add a component that shows all opportunities that meet the criteria.
options.D: Create a list view on the Opportunity object and recommend users switch the view to Kanban to edit by drag and drop.

question:
Universal Container's administrator has been asked to create a many-to-many relationship between two existing custom objects.

Which two steps should the administrator take when enabling the many-to-many relationship?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Create URL fields on a custom object.
options.B: Create a junction with a custom object.
options.C: Create two master-detail relationships on the new object.
options.D: Create two lookup relationships on the new object.

question:
A sales rep has left the company and an administrator has been asked to re-assign all their accounts and opportunities to a new sales rep and keep the teams as is.

Which tool should an administrator use to accomplish this?

options.A: Data Import Wizard
options.B: Dataloader.io
options.C: Data Loader

question:
Which two actions should an administrator perform with Case escalation rules?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Re-assign the Case.
options.B: Change the Case Priority.
options.C: Re-open the Case.
options.D: Send email notifications.

question:
DreamHouse Realty regularly holds open houses for the selling of both houses and condominiums. For condominium open houses, there are a few extra steps that need to be taken. Agents need to be able to submit requests and receive approvals from the homeowners' association.

How can the administrator ensure these extra steps only appear when creating open house records for condominiums?

options.A: Create two page layouts. Use business processes and record types to display the appropriate picklist values.
options.B: Create one page layout. Use business processes to ensure the proper status picklist values display.
options.C: Create one page layout. Use record types to ensure the proper status picklist values display.
options.D: Create two page layouts, one with a House Status field and the other with a Condominium Status field.

question:
Cloud Kicks users are seeing error messages when they use one of their screen flows. The error messages are confusing but could be resolved if the users entered more information on the account before starting the flow.

How should the administrator address this issue?

options.A: Use a fault connector and display a screen with text explaining what went wrong and how to correct it.
options.B: Uncheck the End User Flow Errors box In Setup.
options.C: Create a permission set to allow users to bypass the error.
options.D: Remove validation rules so that the users are able to proceed without complete records.

question:
Northern Trail Outfitters has a custom quick action on Account that creates a new Case.

How should an administrator make the quick action available on the Salesforce mobile app?

options.A: Add the Salesforce Mobile and Lightning Experience action to the page layout.
options.B: Include the action in the Salesforce Mobile Navigation menu.
options.C: Modify compact Case page layout to include the action.
options.D: Create a custom Lightning App with the action.

question:
At Universal Containers, there is a custom field on the Lead named Product Category. Management wants this information to be part of the Opportunity upon lead conversion.

What action should the administrator take to satisfy the request?

options.A: Create a custom field on the Opportunity and map the two fields.
options.B: Create a workflow to update Opportunity fields based on the lead.
options.C: Map the lead custom field to the product's product category field.
options.D: Configure the product categories picklist field on the product.

question:
Cloud Kicks has a screen flow with two questions on the same screen, but only one is necessary at a time. The administrator has been asked to show only the question that is needed.

How should an administrator complete this?

options.A: Use conditional visibility to hide the unnecessary question.
options.B: Use a decision element and a new screen to show the proper question.
options.C: Use branching in the flow screen to show the proper scenario.
options.D: Use a new version of the flow for each scenario.

question:
An administrator at Ursa Major Solar just learned about the AppExchange and how helpful it can be to the company's business.

Which two actions can be accomplished via the AppExchange?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Install industry-specific solution templates.
options.B: Find certified developers and consultants.
options.C: Download the Dataloader data tool.
options.D: Download standard Lightning components.

question:
The support manager at Cloud Kicks wants to respond to customers as quickly as possible. They have requested that the response include the top five troubleshooting tips that could help solve the customer's issue.

What should the administrator suggest to meet these requirements?

options.A: Email Alerts
options.B: Auto-Response Rules
options.C: Knowledge Articles
options.D: Assignment Rules

question:
Universal Containers has a Contact Lightning record page with a component that shows LinkedIn data. The sales team would like to only show this component to those users who have the Sales User profile when they are on their mobile phones.

options.A: Filter the component visibility with Form Factor = Phone.
options.B: Filter the component visibility with User > Profile > Name = Sales User.
options.C: Filter the component visibility with User > Role > Name = Sales User.
options.D: Filter the component visibility with View = Mobile/Tablet.

question:

options.A: Sharing rules
options.B: Profiles
options.C: Sharing set
options.D: Role hierarchy

question:
Users at Cloud Kicks are reporting different options when updating a custom picklist on the Opportunity object based on the kind of opportunity.

Where should an administrator update the option in the picklist?

options.A: Picklist value sets

question:
An administrator is planning to use Data Loader to mass import new records to a custom object from a new API.

What will the administrator need to do to use the Data Loader?

options.A: Append their security token at the end of their password to login.
options.B: Reset their password and their security token.
options.C: Add a permission set that allows them to import data.
options.D: Use the Data Import Tool to mass import custom object records.

question:
An administrator at Universal Containers needs an automated way to delete records based on field values.

options.A: Workflow
options.B: Automation Studio

question:
Cloud Kicks (CK) captures whether an opportunity should be reviewed by someone in product engineering with a checkbox fleld called Needs Review. What should an administrator use to accomplish this?

options.A: Before Save flow
options.B: Required fields
options.C: Workflow rule
options.D: Validation rule

question:
An administrator at AW Computing has been asked to help the Support team with report folders. 
They want a folder called Support Reports and two folders underneath called Helpdesk and R&

options.D: Share the R&D folder with Support Managers with Edit Access.
options.A: Share the Helpdesk folder with Support Agents with View access.
options.B: Share the Support Reports folder with Support Managers with Edit Access.
options.C: Share the Support Reports folder with Support Agents with View Access.

question:
AW Computing needs to capture a loss reason in a rich text field when an opportunity is closed lost.

How should an administrator configure this requirement?

options.A: Select the required checkbox next to the Loss Reason field on the page layout.
options.B: Configure a workflow rule to display an error if Loss Reason is blank.
options.C: Create a validation rule to display an error if stage is closed lost and Loss Reason is blank.
options.D: Check the required checkbox on the Loss Reason field in Object Manager.

question:
Cloud Kicks' executives have noticed the Opportunity Expected Revenue field displays incorrect values.

How should the administrator correct this?

options.A: Change the probability associated with the stage.
options.B: Update the expected revenue associated with the stage.
options.C: Adjust the forecast category associated with the stage.
options.D: Modify the closed won value associated with the stage.

question:
Northern Trail Outfitters has hired interns to enter Leads into Salesforce and has requested a way to identify these new records from existing Leads .

What approach should an administrator take to meet this requirement?

options.A: Define a record type and assign it to the interns.
options.B: Update the active Lead Assignment Rules.
options.C: Set up Web-to-Lead for the interns' use.
options.D: Create a separate Lead Lightning App.

question: What should an administrator use as an identifier when importing and updating records from a separate financial system?

options.A: Auto-Number field

question:
An administrator at DreamHouse Realty wants an easier way to assign cases based on agent capacity and skill set.

options.A: Escalation Rules
options.B: Knowledge Management

question:
Cloud Kicks generates leads for its different product categories (shoes, apparel, and accessories) through many different sources. While some lead sources are used for all three categories, other lead sources are specific to a single category. The VP of marketing requests that only the proper lead sources be displayed based on the product category chosen.

How should the administrator configure Salesforce to meet this requirement?

options.A: Create business processes and record types for each of the three product categories.
options.B: Create a single business process, then create record types for each product category.
options.C: Create a dependency between the Product Category field and Lead Source field.
options.D: Create a page layout for each category and filter the Lead Source field based on category.

question:

Which two options should the administrator configure?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Login Hours
options.B: Currency Locale
options.C: Default Language
options.D: Password Policy

question:
Cloud Kicks wants its reports to show a Fiscal Year that starts on February 1 and has 12 months.

How should the administrator address this requirement?

options.A: Set the Fiscal Year to Standard and the duration to 12 months.
options.B: Set the Fiscal Year to Standard and the starting month as February.
options.C: Set the Fiscal Year to Custom and the duration to 4 quarters.
options.D: Set the Fiscal Year to Custom and the starting month as February.

question:
Cloud Kicks wants to track shoe designs by products. Shoe designs should be unable to be deleted, and there can be multiple designs for one product across various stages.

Which two steps should the administrator configure to meet this requirement?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Create a custom object for shoe designs.
options.B: Use the standard object for designs.
options.C: Add a custom master-detail field for shoe designs on the Product object.
options.D: Configure a custom lookup field for shoe designs on the Product object.

question:

options.A: Data Export Wizard
options.B: Data Export Service
options.C: Data Loader
options.D: Data Import Wizard

question:

options.A: External lookup
options.B: Geofence
options.C: Custom address
options.D: Geolocation

question:
The administrator at Cloud Kicks updated the custom object Event to include a lookup field to the primary contact for the event. When running an event report, they want to reference fields from the associated contact record.

What should the administrator do to pull contact flieds into the custom report?

options.A: Edit the custom Event report type and add fields related via lookup.
options.B: Configure formula fields on Event to populate contact information.
options.C: Use a dashboard with filters to show Event and contact data as requested.
options.D: Create a new report type with Event as the primary object and Contact as a related object.

question:
Universal Containers wants to provide reseller partners with discounted prices on the products they purchase.

How should an administrator configure this requirement?

options.A: Create a separate PriceBook for reseller partners.
options.B: Build separate reseller partner products.
options.C: Use a different Opportunity record type.
options.D: Add a Partner_Discount__c field to the Opportunity.

question:
An administrator at DreamHouse Realty needs to create customized pages for the Salesforce mobile app.

Which two types of pages could an administrator build and customize using the Lightning App Builder?

Choose 2 answers

options.A: Dashboard page
options.B: Record page
options.C: User page
options.D: App page

question:
Cloud Kicks (CK) is partnering with a used shoe store and second-hand bicycle emporium. CK has an automated business process it wants to run once a week to count the number of open cases related to an account.

How should the administrator recommend automating this business process?

options.C: Configure a scheduled flow in Flow Builder.
options.D: Use a process to update the account when it is edited.

question:

options.A: Quick Action
options.B: Approval Process

question:

question:

options.C: The lookup field is required for saving records.

options.B: Any metadata changes to the package have to be replicated in production.

question:

question: Universal Containers has two sales teams, sales team A and sales team

question:

options.B: After resetting a password, the user may be required to activate their device to successfully log in to Salesforce.
options.C: Resetting a locked-out user's password automatically unlocks the user's account.
options.D: Single sign-on users can reset their own passwords using the forgot password link.

question:

options.B: Delete the lead and create a new Contact and Opportunity.
options.C: Add a Contact from the Campaign Member Detail page.
options.D: Clone the lead and convert the cloned record to a Contact.

question:

options.B: Create a simplified Opportunity page layout.
options.C: Add a Path for stage to the opportunity record page.
options.D: Use a Kanban list view for Opportunity.

question:
Universal Containers is trying to improve the user experience when searching for the right status on a case. The company currently has one support process that is used for all record types on cases. How should the administrator improve on the current implementation?

options.A: Review which status choices are needed for each record type and create support processes for each that is necessary.
options.B: Create a Screen Flow that shows only the correct values for status and surface the flow in the utility bar of the console.
options.C: Edit the status choices directly on the record type.
options.D: Reduce the number of case status values to five.

options.A: Components
options.B: Consultants

options.D: Customers

question:

options.B: Configure an owner-based sharing rule.

options.D: Set the Default External Access to Private.

question:

options.C: Modify the Opportunity stage a dependent picklist to the Lead source field.
options.D: Make Lead source a dependent picklist to the Opportunity stage field.

options.B: Flow to create recurring tasks

options.D: Turn on Recurring Activities

question:
Northern Trail Outfitters has two different sales processes: one for business opportunities with four stages and one for partner opportunities with eight stages. Both processes will vary in page layouts and picklist value options.

options.B: Separate record types and sales processes for the different types of opportunities
options.C: Public groups to limit record types and sales processes for opportunities
options.D: Different page layouts that control the picklist values for the opportunity types

question:
AW Computing wants to prevent users from updating the Account Annual Revenue field to be a negative value or an amount more than $100 billion.

options.A: Enable Account Revenue limits in Setup, with 0 as the minimum and 100 billion as the maximum.
options.B: Build a scheduled report displaying Accounts with Account Revenue that is negative or greater than 100 billion.
options.C: Create a validation rule that displays an error if Account Revenue is below 0 or greater than 100 billion.

question:

question:

options.B: Restrict U2F Security Keys on the user's profile to enforce login hours.
options.C: Assign single sign-on to a permission set to allow users to log in when outside the network.

question:

options.A: Accounts should have a lookup to Shipments.
options.B: Shipments should have a master detail to Accounts.
options.C: Accounts should have a master detail to Shipments.
options.D: Shipments should have a lookup to Account.

question:

question:

question:
The administrator at Universal Containers has a screen flow that helps users create new leads. When Lead Source is "Search Engine", the administrator needs to require the user to choose a specific search engine from a picklist. If Lead Source is not "Search Engine", this picklist should be hidden.

How should the administrator complete this requirement?

options.A: Create a picklist for Specific Search Engine, and set conditional visibility so that it is only shown when Lead Source is "Search Engine".
options.B: Assign a decision element to direct the user to a second screen to hold Specific Search Engine only when Lead Source is "Search Engine".
options.C: Use an assignment element, one for when Lead Source is "Search Engine" and one for everything else.
options.D: Configure a picklist for Specific Search Engine, and use a validation rule to conditionally show only when Lead Source is "Search Engine".

question:

options.B: Create a queue and a criteria-based sharing rule.
options.C: Create an auto-response rule and a public group.

question:

options.B: Configure one workflow rule that fires when cases are created. Add a filter for case priority, Select the appropriate email template for the rule.

options.D: Include three assignment rules that fire when cases are created. Add a filter for case priority, Select the appropriate email template for each rule.

question:

options.C: The user's Two-Factor Authentication for API Logins permission

question:

options.D: Edit the Related List component in the Lightning App Builder and choose Enhanced List as the related list type.

question:
Ursa Major Solar is noticing a decrease in deals with a cross-sell opportunity type and want to share all cross-sell opportunities with a team of subject matter experts in their organization, The company has different roles, and the organization-wide default for Opportunity is set to Private.

How should the administrator accomplish this?

options.A: Change the organization-wide default for Opportunity from Private to Public Read/Write to open up access for the subject matter experts.
options.B: Enable territory management, assign the subject matter experts to the same territory, and give them access to the records with manual sharing.
options.C: Add the subject matter experts to a public group and give them access to the records with a criteria-based sharing rule.

question:

question:

question:

question:

options.A: The pending Chatter post will be will be paused.
options.B: The pending Chatter post will be sent on the 10th of the month.
options.C: The pending Chatter post will be canceled.

question:
Northern Trail Outfitters has a new flow that automatically sets field values when a new account is created. The flow is launched by a process, but the Flow is not working properly.

options.A: Use the native debug feature in the How Builder.
options.B: View the setup audit trail and review for errors.
options.C: Set up email logs and review the send error logs.

question:
DreamHouse Realty requires that house showings he scheduled within the current year to prevent too many future showings from stacking up.

How can they make sure Showing Date is only populated with a date this year?

question:

options.A: Configure permission sets

question:

question:
